children.text: There are gaps around the garage panel lift door, which will allow embers to enter in the event of a bushfire.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3959 Construction of Buildings in Bushfire-Prone Areas, states that ‘

Panel lift, tilt doors or side-hung doors shall be fitted with suitable weather strips, draught excluders, draught seals or guide tracks, as appropriate to the door type, with a maximum gap no greater than 3mm’ .
The present installation of this door and the weather strips must be rectified to comply with these requirements.
